content: “Synergistic Ameliorative Capabilities of Quercetin and Ascorbic Acid on Hepatic and Pro-Inflammatory Markers of Arsenic-Induced Toxicity in Obese Wistar Rats”. Fountain Journal of Natural and Applied Sciences 13, no. 2 (August 23, 2024). Accessed December 29, 2025. https://fountainjournals.com/index.php/FUJNAS/article/view/509.
